snippet: You know all the things that have been wrong with young people for the past half-century? They can be traced to a single sitcom moment and a single sitcom matriarch.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger argues, in humorous essay celebrating Mother's Day, that character of Margaret Anderson, the matriarch in the 1950s sitcom Father Knows Best, was the first of many bad TV mothers who have negatively influenced a generation of young people.
lead_paragraph: You know all the things that have been wrong with young people for the past half-century? They can be traced to a single sitcom moment and a single sitcom matriarch.

headline.main: The Mother of All Bad TV Moms
headline.print_headline: The Mother of All Bad TV Moms
